author: Joaquín Simó
description: Deliciously bittersweet with zesty orange and enlivened by sparkling wine. If you like Negronis then you should try this aperitivo.
name: Day Bell
recipeIngredient: 7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)
30 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
